default.description:
It is a Korean dataset that classifies threatening conversation data into four threat situations. 

- 0: threat
- 1: extortion
- 2: workspace
- 3: etc
default.citation:

  title        = {DKTC, Dataset of Korean Threatening Conversations},
  howpublished = {https://github.com/tunib-ai/DKTC},
  year         = {2022},
}
